name: Skyburner's Oath
flavor_text: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

frame.name: Slug Rifle
frame.description: This weapon lobs explosive slugs. When you're aiming down sights, the slugs travel fast and straight. When you're firing from the hip, the explosion is larger and applies Scorch to the target.

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: This weapon is Full Auto, does extra damage to Cabal, and penetrates Phalanx shields.
perks.name: For the Empire

perks.description:
This weapon is especially easy to grip.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
perks.name: Short-Action Stock
